Description:
ONE OF THE BEST
This beautiful titled allotment is one of the best located at the end of a quiet Cul-de-sac.
With a spacious size of approximately 840m2 and over sized dimensions you can build the most stunning home to match this ideal location.
All services available such as mains water, underground power, Sewer & NBN all you need to do is pick out your home and start your build.
In this location you have a quick drive to Cowes main street and a short stroll to the beautiful north facing Beaches that Cowes has to offer.
Call Alex Scott Cowes today to secure your land 5952 2633.

Description:
Sand, Sea, Shopping or Golf?
With amazing views down the 6th fairway, and an incredible central Cowes location - a hop skip and jump away from popular Lovers walk, the pristine north facing Cowes beach, cafes, wine bars, boutique shopping, restaurants and everything that Cowes has to offer.
This tri-level townhouse is perfect for holiday or permanent living.
On the ground floor, living / kitchen /dining areas with a connecting balcony overlooking the golf course, is the perfect place to enjoy a drink on a sunny afternoon.
On the middle level you will find the master bedroom, with more spectacular golf course views, and a family bathroom/laundry.
While on the top level you will find a very generous sized second bedroom, and handy storage.
Also featuring:-
Single garage with internal access
Visitor car park
Direct access to the golf course
2 toilets
Reverse cycle heating/cooling
Leave the car at home, all you need is a beach towel and your golf clubs!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
YOUR PERFECT ESCAPE
Getting harder to find in this price range, this perfect beach house is ready to go for many years enjoyment.
Located in a quiet area the fully fenced property features three good sized bedrooms, central bathroom with two separate toilets and open plan living with down lights and polished timber floors throughout.
Outdoor entertaining is taken care of with a large covered deck both front and back and has a single drive through carport with extra height for the boat or caravan in mind; all only a short stroll to the beach. Wont last long!

Description:
MODERN MAGIC
This light filled apartment is absolutely immaculate and located directly across the road from the beautiful family friendly Cowes foreshore Beach and just a quick stroll to the shops, restaurants and Cowes Pier so sit back and enjoy this fantastic location.
Featuring two spacious bedrooms, both with built in robes, the master with access to the wrap around balcony. An open plan living and dining space, stunning kitchen with plenty of storage and stone bench tops and a central bathroom with a corner spa. Windows are tinted for privacy plus balcony doors slide right open to create a beautiful open plan living space to enjoy the sunshine and that water view!
Additionally, the apartment comes with an underground carpark. Leave the car at home and stroll across the road to the North facing Bay Beach and children’s play ground.

Description:
Make your move!
This tri-level hardiplank home, located in the beautiful and extremely sought-after town of Cowes will entice large families, investors and holiday makers alike. Only a short walk to the cafes, restaurants, supermarkets and boutique shops of the main street of Cowes and just over a kilometre to the water's edge.
The ground floor comprises a large bedroom with full ensuite plus a private living area which flows out onto the undercover decking overlooking the beautiful rear garden. Adjacent to this is the well designed laundry with excellent storage.
On the second/middle floor are the three remaining spacious bedrooms, two with built in robes, while the master has a walk in robe and ensuite. The main bathroom and separate toilet are also located on this floor.
At the top of the stairs is the light filled open plan living/kitchen/dining area complete with stainless steel miele dishwasher, electric induction cooktop, fan-forced oven and Caesarstone benchtops. With lovely views and water glimpses the north facing covered decking is the perfect place to relax and enjoy an evening barbecue.
Other features include: split system heating and cooling, tiles and carpet throughout, garden shed, established low maintenance surrounds.
All of this is set within a 574 sqm approx. fully fenced allotment
This property for Sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Stunning private position in central Cowes.
This beautiful, single level two bedroom unit offers privacy in a quiet block of 6 beautifully maintained units. Situated at the rear down a well tended driveway, this unit shares no walls so is quiet and just like being in a small house.Offering two living areas, a light filled sitting room perfect for a quiet space or perhaps a place for watching movies and a spacious open plan family living area and a well designed kitchen with tiled floors, opening to the back garden through french doors. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances and a caesar stone benchtop. Two bedrooms, master with split system and direct access to the bathroom with bath and separate shower. Both bedrooms have built in robes. Entry from the remote controlled garage is through the laundry and there is also a door to the back garden. A large water tank allows for water to be used in the laundry and toilet.
New carpets have been laid in the bedrooms and sitting room. Two split systems for year round comfort and lovely light filled rooms - make this your special place on the Island. Perfect for permanent living or your Island getaway.
Perfectly positioned to walk everywhere - the beach, Cowes' shopping and cafe precinct, Phillip Island Bowling Club and the Golf Course and the Football oval.

Description:
Fresh, Innovative Design
This architect/custom built brick 4 bedroom home, is situated in the popular Seagrove Estate, walking distance to schools, shops and sheltered Cowes foreshore.
A practical floor plan, quality fittings and finishes, and endless storage - make this and ideal home for permanent, holiday or investment.
As you enter the property, to the right you will find the 4th bedroom or study/home office, and to the left you have internal access to the oversized double garage, with workbench and cabinetry. A separate living room presents as you walk further through the home.
The showstopper is the kitchen! This spacious bright kitchen has been well designed, creating the perfect place to cook up a storm for guests, or to prepare and enjoy an evening meal with the family. Featuring high quality Bosch appliances, Caesar Stone bench tops with waterfall ends, glass splash black, central island bench - which can also function as a dining space, and loads of storage space.
The open plan dining/living area opens out on to a north facing undercover alfresco area, to expand your entertaining options.
At the rear of the home you will find the generous master suite - complete with full ensuite (with large shower and heated towel rails), walk in robe, and a built in robe.
2 further large bedrooms with built in robes, a central family bathroom, powder room and separate laundry complete the unique design.
Also featuring:-
Multiple built in robes/glass door storage cupboards throughout the home
Bamboo flooring
Double glazed windows
High Ceilings
Ducted heating and cooling (3 zone)
LED lighting with dimmers
Quality window furnishings including plantation shutters and roller blinds
The home is positioned on a 753sqm allotment, and the space has been well designed to accomodate for:-
Colorbond 6 x 3m shed, with front and rear roller doors
1600 litre water tank
Outdoor shower
Level backyard with retaining walls and drainage system
Double layered weed mat under all pathways and gardens
Raised cypress pine garden beds with organic soil
Raised netted stawberry patch
Style, space and endless storage - don't miss this amazing opportunity - contact us today to arrange your inspection!

Description:
READY TO MOVE IN!
This beautifully presented 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 1 year old home is fully equipped with all you need as a perfect investment or holiday home.
The owners have not skipped a beat in the design process, with stylish vinyl flooring, stainless steel appliances, ducted heating and cooling throughout and central second bathroom.
The spacious master bedroom is situated at the front of the property and includes ensuite with double basins and walk in robe.
Additional features include ceiling fans in all bedrooms, two car garage, side access to the backyard and a great entertaining area at the rear perfect for your morning cuppa.
Currently a successful permanent rental, enquire now to see what rental return you could achieve.
Dont wait, inspect now!

Description:
Great Family Entertainer!
This 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom (builders own) brick home in central Cowes - would be perfect for family living!
Walking distance to the RSL, Thompson Avenue, Primary Schools and local sporting facilities, and situated on a 538sqm low maintenance fully fenced block, in a quiet court location - makes the property ideal for permanent, holiday or investment!
At the front of the home is the master bedroom (complete with ensuite and walk in robe) and the 4th bedroom or Study with built in robes.
To the rear of the home, a spacious kitchen, living, dining area impresses with its size and practicality. The kitchen, featuring Brazilian granite island bench and granite splashback, offers ample storage, with plenty of cupboards and 2 fridge spaces. The high 9ft ceilings throughout the home, really enhance the feeling of size and space.
A further 2 generous bedrooms (both with built in robes), family bathroom, separate toiliet and laundry complete the inside area.
Outside, an undercover pergola with café blinds provides a fantastic spot to entertain, year round.
Also featuring:-
Solar Power (8 Panels)
2 x Garden sheds
2 x Water tanks
Double remote garage with single door rear access.
There is nothing to do, just move in and enjoy the Cowes lifestyle!

Description:
STUNNING, SOPHISTICATED & SPACIOUS
This unique new build is a spacious, modern, stand out located in the heart of central Cowes.
Seamlessly spread over one level, featuring four spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, the master with ensuite and walk in robe. The house flows beautifully with all of the bedrooms sectioned to one side of the house. The main living and dining area boats high ceilings and beautiful Tasmanian oak floors throughout.
The kitchen is stunning with gas top cooking, stone bench tops and modern stainless steel appliances. Additionally, there are split systems throughout the main living area and second living area.
Complete with outdoor deck and awning for shade plus beautiful low maintenance yard space for all the family to run around. Outdoors is also complete with a large carport and plenty of parking for caravans and boats.
Located in this idyllic street in Central Cowes, a short stroll to local shops, restaurants and bars, the local primary school and of course the renowned Cowes North facing family friendly beach. This home is the perfect beach retreat, or great for permanent living!
Book an inspection today.

POSITION PERFECT
Positioned in a fantastic location with the beach at the end of the street and an easy walk to the main street this recently renovated home is the perfect getaway you have been waiting for.
Featuring three generous bedrooms with built in robes and polished timber floors, the master with ensuite plus central bathroom.
To the rear of the home you will find a separate kitchen/dining with dishwasher and two large living areas opening onto a sunny deck overlooking tree tops and big backyard.
There is also room to park the boat in the double carport and huge store room under the house.
Won't last long in this tightly held spot.

Description:
STUNNING VIEWS IN PRIME LOCATION
Boasting the most beautiful views over Erehwon Point and The Esplanade from the second level, this apartment is a luxurious get away for you and the family.
This apartment is currently permanently and generating a great income with the lease due to expire September 2019. Featuring a bedroom suite with lounge and North facing balcony to enjoy a morning cuppa in the sunshine overlooking the water. The bathroom is fully equipped including a spa bath. The kitchenette is compact, inclusive of cooktop and fridge compartment. The second living and dining area duals as a second bedroom space, ensuring the apartment can comfortably sleep four.
This apartment is the perfect holiday retreat for the family, and equally an investment opportunity for a first home buyer or savvy investor.
Leave the car at home as this apartment is a walk to everything! Situated in prestige position across the road from the family friendly Cowes foreshore Beach, playground, Cowes Jetty, local restaurants and bars and shopping precincts. This is one opportunity you dont want to miss!
Book an inspection today.

Description:
LOCATED IN THE HEART OF TOWN
Located in an excellent location in the heart of town this penthouse sized apartment is one of the largest in this small boutique complex.
Featuring huge, light filled, open plan living areas opening onto a massive veranda perfect for entertaining the largest of families and guests.
Theres also three generous bedrooms, two bathrooms, the master with ensuite, and plenty of storage with built in robes.
Add to this two car spaces behind the secure electric gates, split system heating and cooling, full sized laundry and convenient 3rd separate toilet.
All only metres from restaurants, cafes and bars and of course Cowes sandy north facing beaches.This FULLY FURNISHED & EQUIPPED apartment has just about everything you need to move straight in or continue to enjoy the excellent, ongoing short-stay rental returns.
A must inspect.

Description:
Your Island Weekend Escape!
Located within the popular and family friendly Ramada Resort on Phillip Island is this amazing villa presenting a wonderful opportunity to secure your weekend getaway at an affordable price!
This incredible villa stands out from the rest not only comprising two bedrooms with built in robes, open plan living, kitchen and dining area, bathroom with shower and vanity, separate toilet and European laundry, it is offered fully furnished with attractive contemporary styling. Additionally this particular villa boasts a barbecue plus built in bench space and an electronic remote control awning over a spacious alfresco deck, perfect for outdoor entertainment. It also offers a second smaller deck at the rear of the property overlooking a lush garden area. Not to mention, it boasts split system heating/cooling, gas heating, dishwasher, washing machine, dryer and ceiling fans as well as parking for two cars.
This incredible villa is well located on Woodland Circuit and just a short walk to the health club, tennis courts, swimming pools, barbecue and picnic area, children's playground, "Numbers cafe and bar" and pizzeria. A few minutes drive takes you into the Cowes shopping precinct, RSL and amazing north facing bay beach.
This is the perfect opportunity to have your own holiday home or to invest for holiday letting purposes, the choice is yours. This villa is a Leasehold property, currently outside of any management scheme giving you the freedom to decide how to use your villa.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Your Very Own Cowes Holiday Apartment!
A rare opportunity to secure an apartment in The Waves complex, that is not currently under a lease agreement. Use personally for permanent living, a great holiday escape, or as an excellent addition to your investment portfolio to rent out as either a holiday apartment or permanent rental.
Perfectly located in central Cowes, this fully furnished, one bedroom self contained apartment is fitted out to sleep 4 and is the perfect little weekender. The location says it all with this one, only a stone's throw away from Cowes main beach and short stroll to the shops, wine bar's, cafes and restaurants. Park your car in the secure undercover car park and put the keys away until you need to go home.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Outside you will find private landscaped low maintenance gardens, covered outdoor entertaining options and an outdoor 4 seater spa.

Description:
WOW – LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION
It's all about location… this is an extremely rare opportunity to purchase a unique home in a great location, situated at the end of a private road just past the golf course with the beach access to Red Rocks beach directly opposite your front door.
This type of property is rarely offered to the market for sale so it is a unique opportunity to purchase a property that will last the test of time.
The lower level offers three full bedrooms and huge bathroom facilities. The upstairs living area, kitchen and dining area is a huge open living area with glass like hardwood floors that lead out to a private undercover outdoor living area that has a feeling of being in the tree tops and is great place to enjoy the long summer evenings!

Description:
Calling all Developers!
When position and development potential is a priority - look no further. On offer is a large (1261sqm approx.) corner allotment. This superb, central Cowes location is only a stone's throw from shops, amenities, cafés and bars and a short walk to the perfect north facing beach.
This neat and tidy 2 bedroom home comprises a central family bathroom, formal lounge, and a separate kitchen. Outside, a garage and carport with plenty of storage, and low maintenance yard complete the package.
Secure and design your beachside home, or discover the subdivision potential (STCA). Love where you live in low density surrounds, idyllic location and enviable position on Phillip Island!

Address: Villa 106/2128 Phillip Island Road Cowes VIC 3922
Description:
RELAX & ENJOY
This immaculate villa located within Phillip Island's Ramada Resort and not part of the resort's rental pool offers an affordable investment opportunity or ideal family getaway.
Being one of the larger villas and in a prime position within the resort, it comprises three bedrooms, two bathrooms and a sunny, open plan living/dining and kitchen that opens onto a spacious rear deck with lovely rural views.
The resort is close to all that Cowes has to offer and only a short drive to the beach. The resort facilities include a cafe/bar, indoor gym & pool, games room, tennis court, outdoor BBQ areas and outdoor pool. All this within an easy 1.5 hour drive from Melbourne.
